sentences.sContent: It is one of only two mammals (the echidna is the other) that lay eggs.
sentences.sCn: 它是仅有的两种产蛋哺乳动物之一。

sentences.sContent: Occasionally, hens lay eggs with imperfect shells or without shells altogether.
sentences.sCn: 有时候，母鸡产蛋要么壳不完美要么干脆没有壳。

sentences.sContent: The most amazing (and badass) characteristic of the komodo dragon is that the female can lay eggs that hatch without being fertilized by a male (this is called parthenogenesis).
sentences.sCn: 而他们最令人叹为观止的特点是：科摩多巨蜥可以单性繁殖——即雌性科摩多巨蜥可以再未受精的情况下产蛋。
